data.actual_result: The top bar some permissions from the permissions tab, makes reference to channel settings. And also some permissions are missing. For example you cannot set as a role to can't see a category (can't make the category private)
data.expected_result: The top bar and the permissions from the permissions tab should make reference to category/category settings. Also there should be the same permissions as on desktop (when adding a role/member and trying to manage the perms).
data.short_description: In the permissions tab for a category, the top bar and some of permissions will say "channel settings" / be about channel settings.
data.steps_to_repro: - Make a server with a few categories and channels - Edit a category  - Go to the permissions tab - Observe the top bar saying "channel settings" instead of "category settings" - Press add a role/a member - Observe the permissions that you can manage. Some are missing. For example you cannot the category private (don't let a role see it) - Optional see attachments
